attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed benefit decrease is not going to help the public. You are asking parents to get a job becasue of decreased benefits yet who is goign to pay for a child minder the parents out of their wages SO in effect you are forcing peopel out to work to pay someone else to bring up their children. LEAVE THE BENEFITS. Give the benefits to the people and not put them in the goverments pockets to make them richer and us the people of the UK poorer.
